text: Presidential elections were held in Peru in 1908. Augusto B. Leguía of the Civilista Party was elected unopposed.Fernando Tuesta Soldevilla (2001) Perú politítico en cifras, Friedrich Ebert Stiftung, p609 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Party !Votes !% |- |align=left|Augusto B. Leguía||align=left|Civilista Party||133,732||100 |- |colspan=2 align=left|Invalid/blank votes||50,654||− |- |colspan=2 align=left|Total||184,386||100 |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: Tuesta |} ==References== 1908 Category:1908 elections in South America Category:1908 in Peru 1908
title: 1908 Peruvian presidential election
